36#include <config.h>
37
38#include <signal.h>
39#include <krb5/roken.h>
40
41/*
42 * We would like to always use this signal but there is a link error
43 * on NEXTSTEP
44 */
45#if !defined(NeXT) && !defined(__APPLE__)
46/*
47 * Bugs:
48 *
49 * Do we need any extra hacks for SIGCLD and/or SIGCHLD?
50 */
51
52ROKEN_LIB_FUNCTION SigAction ROKEN_LIB_CALL
53signal(int iSig, SigAction pAction)
54{
55 struct sigaction saNew, saOld;
56
57 saNew.sa_handler = pAction;
58 sigemptyset(&saNew.sa_mask);
59 saNew.sa_flags = 0;
60
61 if (iSig == SIGALRM)
62 {
63#ifdef SA_INTERRUPT
64 saNew.sa_flags |= SA_INTERRUPT;
65#endif
66 }
67 else
68 {
69#ifdef SA_RESTART
70 saNew.sa_flags |= SA_RESTART;
71#endif
72 }
73
74 if (sigaction(iSig, &saNew, &saOld) < 0)
75 return(SIG_ERR);
76
77 return(saOld.sa_handler);
78}
79#endif
80
